channel.title: Removing a skill and Adding new one
channel.description:
Ok so im using InsidaX and i wana remove the pk skill and add constrution back.
Iv googled and i have idea were to start with removing the skill. How would i do this?
for constrution i wana make it so if u use a saw on a log it will give u a plank and X amount of xp.... how would i come at doing this?

item.title: Removing a skill and Adding new one
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Removing a skill? Just remove any code that’s associated with the skill.

Read full topic
item.source: Removing a skill and Adding new one
